flawed_nl_solution:
To move in, Janet had to pay 2 months worth of rent so that would cost 2*1250 = $<<2*1250=25000>>25000
On top of the rent she needed to pay a deposit of $500 so 25000+500 = $<<25000+500=25500>>25500 total to rent the apartment
If it cost $25500 to move in and she had $2225 then she need 25500-2225 = $<<25500-2225=23275>>23275 more
#### 23275

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2500, not 25000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
